segments.advisor_message: Alright, umm, before we go any further, can you tell me your, like, full name? I mean, uh, your last name and first name and if you have, like, any middle names?
segments.client_message: Sure! My name is, uh, Sarah Jane Smith. So that's Sarah for first name, Jane is my middle name, and Smith is the last name.

segments.advisor_message: Great, thanks! And, um, do you wanna share how you prefer to be addressed, like any title or what you go by? Maybe your date of birth too?
segments.client_message: Uh, you can just call me Sarah, and I was born on, uh, 15-03-1990, in New York. No title, just Sarah's fine!
